THE

BIBLE

BIBLE


In Their Own Words

PREFACE

Le langage est source de malentendus.
— Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,Le Petit Prince

1 How the

solitary, that was of  ! how is she as a  ! she that was

the  , and princess the  , how is she tributary!
2 She weepeth in the  , and her are on her cheeks: all her lovers she

to her: all her have treacherously with her, they are her  .
3 is into because of  , and because of servitude: she

the  , she findeth no  : all her persecutors overtook her between the straits.
4 The of do  , because

to the solemn  : all her are  : her sigh, her virgins are  , and she is in bitterness.
5 Her are the  , her  ; for the

her for the of her  : her are into before the  .
6 And from the of all her is  : her are

harts that no pasture, and they are

before the pursuer.
7

in the of her and of her miseries all her

that she had in the of  , when her

into the of the  , and did her: the

her, and did mock at her  .
